title: WBC.TV: Verify that the scoreboard_iphone.xml has the correct team names, game times & stations currently providing feeds
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the TV menu item from the Navigation Bar

Prod: http://gd.mlb.com/components/game/int/year_2013/month_08/day_05/scoreboard_iphone.xml
QA: http://gd.qa.mlb.com/components/game/int/year_2013/month_08/day_05/scoreboard_iphone.xml
custom_steps: When we look at the feeds available to us in the TV menu
custom_expected: Then the results will properly matchup to what is available in the scoreboard_iphone.xml file

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if we select an WBC.TV feed from within Gameday that the feed begins to play successfully if the user is logged into a WorldBaseballClassic.com Account that has a valid WBC.TV subscription
custom_preconds:
Given that we are currently logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And we have selected the Gameday menu item
custom_steps: When we tap on a live stream
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV stream successfully begins to play

title: WBC.TV: Verify if we are logged into a valid WorldBaseballClassic.com Account that has WBC.TV access and select the TV icon on the Scoreboard for a particular game that we are able to launch the WBC.TV feed successfully
custom_preconds:
Given that we are currently logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And we have tapped on the Scoreboard menu item
custom_steps:
When we tap on an Active Game Tile
And tap on the TV icon
custom_expected: Then we are able to successfully stream WBC.TV

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if we select a particular game and then go to each of those Teams page that we are able to hit the TV icon on those team pages to successfully start the WBC.TV stream
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected a particular game from today
And that game is active
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Teams menu item
And we tap on one of the Teams from the game that we selected
And we tap on the TV icon
custom_expected:
Then the WBC.TV stream will start successfully

REPEAT

title: WBC.TV (Login Screen): Verify if we tap the Forgot Password button on the Login Screen that it will open up the password request flow page
custom_preconds:
Given the authentication wall is visible
And the Subscriber Log In button is tapped
custom_steps: When we tap on the Forgot Password button
custom_expected: Then the password request flow page will become visible to the user

title: WBC.TV (Login Screen): Verify if we tap the Forgot Password button on the Login Screen and then click the Back button that it properly backs us out of the password request flow
custom_preconds:
Given the authentication wall is visible
And the Subscriber Log In button is tapped
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Forgot Password button
And we tap the Back button
custom_expected: Then we are properly brought back to the login page

title: WBC.TV (Login Screen): Verify if we tap the Forgot Password button on the Login Screen and follow the flow to the end that we can successfully reset our password
custom_preconds:
Given the authentication wall is visible
And the Subscriber Log In button is tapped
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Forgot Password button
And we follow the flow to the end
custom_expected: Then we are able to successfully reset our password

title: WBC.TV (Login Screen): Verify if we have reset our password that the user is then able to successfully login with the new password that has been provided
custom_preconds:
Given the authentication wall is visible
And the Subscriber Log In button is tapped
And we have completed the Forgot Password flow
custom_steps: When we utilize the new password that we've been provided
custom_expected: Then we are able to successfully login

title: WBC.TV (Login Screen): Verify that if we attempt to login with an WBC.TV Executive account that we are successful
custom_preconds:
Given the authentication wall is visible
And the Subscriber Log In button is tapped
custom_steps: When we attempt to login with an WorldBaseballClassic.com Executive account (media6@mlbtest.com / password)
custom_expected: Then we are successful

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if we have logged into an WBC.TV Executive account that we can watch Video
custom_preconds: Given we have logged into an mlb.com Executive account (media6@mlbtest.com / password)
custom_steps: When we attempt to start up an WBC.TV feed
custom_expected: Then we will be successful

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if a user has previously logged into an authorized mlb.com account through Settings that they are able to start up an WBC.TV stream if they have the correct subscription
custom_preconds:
Given the user has already entered their authorized mlb.com Account credentials through the Settings menu
And the account being utilized has a valid subscription to watch an WBC.TV stream
custom_steps: When the user attempts to start up an WBC.TV stream
custom_expected: Then they are successful

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if a user has previously saved their account information although since then they have changed their password.  The next time they attempt to start up an WBC.TV feed they will be prompted to login again
custom_preconds:
Given the user has already entered their authorized mlb.com Account information previously
And the user has changed their password their password since then
But the user hasn't updated their password inside of the application yet
custom_steps: When the user attempts to start up an WBC.TV stream
custom_expected: Then they will be prompted with the WBC.TV Login Screen to update their login information

title: WBC.TV: Create Single Sign On Violation
custom_preconds:
Given the user has 5 devices
And the user has logged in the same Authorized MLB.com Account on 5 devices
And the user has started up an WBC.TV stream on 4 of the devices
custom_steps: When the user attempts to start up a 5 concurrent WBC.TV stream
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive a single sign in violation message
And the user will not be able to start up the WBC.TV stream

title: WBC.TV: Verify that we can play an WBC.TV Stream while utilizing a WiFi Connection
custom_preconds:
Given we are currently utilizing a WiFi Connection
And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And there is an active game available
And that active game has a valid WBC.TV Stream
custom_steps: When we attempt to start up the WBC.TV Stream
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream begins to play successfully

title: WBC.TV: Verify that we can play an WBC.TV Stream while utilizing a Carrier Connection of Verizon and/or Sprint
custom_preconds:
Given we are currently utilizing a Carrier Connection from Verizon
Or we are currently utilizing a Carrier Connection from Sprint
And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And there is an active game available
And that active game has a valid WBC.TV Stream
custom_steps: When we attempt to start up the WBC.TV Stream
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream begins to play successfully

title: WBC.TV: Verify that we can play an WBC.TV Stream while utilizing a Carrier Connection of AT&T and/or T-Mobile
custom_preconds:
Given we are currently utilizing a Carrier Connection from AT&T
Or we are currently utilizing a Carrier Connection from T-Mobile
And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And there is an active game available
And that active game has a valid WBC.TV Stream
custom_steps: When we attempt to start up the WBC.TV Stream
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream begins to play successfully

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if we have an WBC.TV Stream running that it will briefly continue if we roam from a Network Connection to No Network Connection
custom_preconds:
Given we currently have a Network Connection available
And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And there is an active game available
And that active game has a valid WBC.TV Stream
custom_steps:
When we start the WBC.TV Stream while on the Network Connection
And we roam to an area where there is No Network Connection
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream will briefly continue to play until the cache has been exhausted

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if we have an WBC.TV Stream running that it will continue if we roam from a WiFi Connection to a Carrier Connection
custom_preconds:
Given we currently are connected to a WiFi Connection
And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And there is an active game available
And that active game has a valid WBC.TV Stream
custom_steps:
When we start the WBC.TV Stream while on the WiFi Connection
And we roam to an area where we are then utilizing a Carrier Connection
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream will continue to play successfully

title: WBC.TV: Verify that if we have an WBC.TV Stream running that it will continue if we roam from a Carrier Connection to a WiFi Connection
custom_preconds:
Given we currently are connected to a Carrier Connection
And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account
And there is an active game available
And that active game has a valid WBC.TV Stream
custom_steps:
When we start the WBC.TV Stream while on the Carrier Connection
And we roam to an area where we are then utilizing a WiFi Connection
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream will continue to play successfully

title: WBC.TV: Verify if we attempt to play multiple feeds in sequence from the scoreboard overlay inside of an WBC.TV Stream that we are successful
custom_preconds:
Given we have multiple game feeds currently available
And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account
custom_steps:
When we start up an WBC.TV Stream
And select another WBC.TV Stream from the Scoreboard Overlay
custom_expected:
Then the WBC.TV Stream starts up successfully
And the WBC.TV Stream doesn't throw any error messages

REPEAT

title: WBC.TV: Verify if we receive a call during an WBC.TV Stream that it functions correctly while on a Carrier Connection of Verizon and/or Sprint
custom_preconds:

And we have logged into an authorized mlb.com account

And we have the WBC.TV Stream playing
custom_steps: When we receive a call
custom_expected:
Then the WBC.TV Stream will pause
And the user is able to answer the call successfully

title: WBC.TV: Verify that while a device is playing an WBC.TV Stream that if we turn it back and forth between portrait and landscape modes that the WBC.TV Stream will continue to stream in landscape only

custom_steps: When we move the device between portrait & landscape mode
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream will continue to play in landscape mode

And we have send the application to the background
custom_steps: When we bring the application to the foreground again
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV Stream will be paused

And we have selected an active game that our Favorite Team is currently playing

custom_expected:

And our Favorite Teams feed will start

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Tapping on the videos tab - World Baseball Classic/WBC.TV subscriber
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Videos tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see both the WBC.TV and Highlights tabs

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Default tab - World Baseball Classic user - WBC.TV
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
custom_steps:
When the user tapped on the Videos tab
And it is the first time tapping the Videos tab
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV tab will load by default

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Navigation - date navigation using arrows
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Videos tab
And taps on either arrow to the left and right of the date
custom_expected:
Then the corresponding date according to which arrow is tapped

Tapping on the right arrow will load the scheduled games of the next day
Tapping on the left arrow will load the scheduled games of the previous day

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Navigation - toggling between highlights and WBC.TV
custom_preconds: Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Videos tab
And taps on the WBC.TV tab
custom_expected:
Then the WBC.TV page will load that day's scheduled games
And when the user taps on the highlights tab
Then the highlights page will load

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Navigation - date navigation bound to this season

custom_steps:
When the user taps on the videos tab 
And the user taps on WBC.TV tab
And taps on the date picker
custom_expected: Then the user will only be able to select dates within the current season

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Navigation - using date picker
custom_preconds: Given the user logs in with an authorized mlb.com account
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the videos tab
And taps on the WBC.TV tab at the top
And taps on the date at the top
And selects a date
custom_expected: Then the grid will load the selected dates games

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Display - live game
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
And there is a live game on
custom_steps:
When the user taps on Videos
And taps on WBC.TV tab
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a gold live icon on the right of the cell for the games that are in progress
And the teams WBC.TV channels will be highlighted in blue

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Display - scheduled game
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
And there is a scheduled game
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Videos tab
And taps on the WBC.TV tab
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the scheduled start time in the right of all games that have not started
And the teams will be in bold black text

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Display - archived game
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
And there is a game that had video and has been completed
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Videos tab
And taps on the WBC.TV tab
custom_expected:
Then there will be a grey ARCHIVE button in the right of the cell of games that have been completed and had video
And the teams will be in bold black text

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Display - scheduled game - time zones continental US
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account
And there are scheduled games
custom_steps:
When the user sets the device time zone to CT
And taps on the Videos tab
And taps the WBC.TV tab
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the scheduled games times in the time zone of the device
And the the teams will be in bold black text

Repeat for MT and PT

title: WBC.TV - Grid: Display - scheduled game - time zones outside continental US

Given the user is logged in with an authorized mlb.com account

custom_steps:
When the user changes their device time zone to GMT

And taps on WBC.TV tab

title: WBC.TV (Plays Overlay): Verify that the Plays Overlay will update according to the refresh settings currently set inside the application
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Play Overlay enabled
custom_expected: Then the Plays Overlay will update according to the refresh settings set inside the application

title: WBC.TV (Plays Overlay): Verify that plays showing up on the Plays Overlay are accurate and readable
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Play Overlay enabled
custom_expected:
Then the plays will be accurate
And the plays will be readable

title: WBC.TV (Plays Overlay): Verify that the user is able to toggle between innings
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Plays Overlay enabled
custom_steps: When the user taps on an inning
custom_expected: Then the Plays Overlay will update to show that particular inning

And that active game has it's Plays Overlay enabled

title: WBC.TV (Plays Overlay): Verify that scoring changes appear in bold red font
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Plays Overlay enabled
And there are currently some runs in the game we are looking at
custom_expected: Then the scoring changes will appear in bold red font

title: WBC.TV (Plays Overlay): Verify that delays will appear in a white font under the Plays Overlay
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Plays Overlay enabled
custom_steps: When an on field or injury delay (field event) occurs (not a game delay)
custom_expected: Then the delay header will be displayed in a white font

title: WBC.TV (Plays Overlay): Verify that the At Bats section of Plays displays the top and bottom of each inning
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Plays Overlay enabled
custom_expected:
Then the top of the inning will be visible
And the bottom of the inning will be visible

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that the teams are listed as Away Team followed by Home team on the Lineup Overlay
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And the Lineups Overlay is enabled
custom_expected: Then we will see that the teams are listed as the Away Team followed by the Home Team

custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has the Lineup Overlay enabled
custom_steps: When we tap on a team name
custom_expected: Then that teams respective lineup will appear

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that when the Lineup Overlay is enabled that the current player at bat will be highlighted
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that the Lineup Overlay is enabled
custom_expected: Then the current player at bat will be highlighted

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that the lineup is listed 1 through 9 and that a P is also shown for the pitcher
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that the Lineup Overlay is enabled
custom_expected:
Then the lineup will be listed 1 through 9 accurately
And a P will be visible below 9 for the Pitcher

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that player names are followed by their respective position in the Lineup section of the Lineup Overlay
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Lineup Overlay enabled
custom_expected: Then player names will have their respective position next to them if they appear in the Lineup section of the Lineup Overlay

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that a players at bats are properly displayed next to their name such as 0-0, 0-1, 1-2, etc...
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
custom_steps: When we look at a player
custom_expected:
Then the player will have their at bats to the right of their name
And those at bats will be correct for that particular game

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that HR, RBI and/or SB will be displayed correctly to the right of the players name in the Lineup Overlay
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has the Lineup Overlay enabled
custom_steps: When the user has an HR, RBI and/or RBI available
custom_expected: Then the HR, RBI and/or RBI will display correctly to the right of the user's name after their at bats

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that we can't permanently move the Lineup Overlay to the left side of the screen
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Lineup Overlay enabled
custom_steps: When we drag the Lineup Overlay across the screen
custom_expected: Then it will reset immediately when we let go of it

title: WBC.TV (Lineup Overlay): Verify that when a player is utilized from the Available Position Players section or Bullpen section that they are removed from that particular section
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Lineup Overlay enabled
custom_steps:
When we utilize a player from the Available Position Players section
Or we utilize a player from the Bullpen section
custom_expected:
Then that particular player will no longer be visible under the Available Position Players section
Or that particular player will no longer be visible under the Bullpen section

custom_preconds:
Given we have selected an active game
And that active game we have started up WBC.TV
And that active game has it's Lineup Overlay enabled
custom_steps: When we swipe the Lineup Overlay to the right
custom_expected: Then it will disappear off the screen
